articles.caption: A look at Google Play Android games now available on PC
articles.title: Google Play Android games now available on PC in beta
articles.description: Google is launching its Android games on PC beta in the US. The open beta will let you run up to 85 games on PC, with full sync support.

articles.caption: A look at Dapper Labs laying off 22% of staff
articles.title: Dapper Labs' Feldman: 'A difficult day' as company lays off 22% of staff
articles.description: Dapper Labs laid off up to 22% of its workforce as the company restructures amid a relative downturn in digital asset marketplaces.

articles.caption: A look at Muus Collective teaming up with Revolve Group to blend fashion, games and Web3
articles.title: Muus Collective teams up with Revolve Group to blend fashion, games and Web3
articles.description: Fashion gaming startup Muus Collective has teamed up with fashion and beauty firm Revolve Group to bring Web3 games to fashion consumers. Muus Collective recently raised $5 million in funding from Griffin Gaming Partners to make a fashion game with blockchain technology. The title is expected to debut in 2023. articles.description: A choice between two evils Royalties have given marketplaces operating in the NFT space massive headaches lately. Cheered on by profit-maximizing traders

articles.caption: A look at Game of Thrones NFTs latest effort with crypto collectibles
articles.title: Game of Thrones NFTs latest effort to tempt fans with crypto collectibles
articles.description: A series of Game of Thrones NFTs joins a flurry of other initiatives aimed at enticing massive fandoms accustomed to shelling out cash for the latest round of branded collectibles.

articles.caption: A look at VRJam launching Web3 venue for virtual concerts & live events
articles.title: VRJam launches a Web3 venue for virtual concerts and live events
articles.description: VRJam is launching its digital venue for virtual concerts and live events. It bills itself as a Web3 metaverse entertainment platform.
